newsitem.title: UK: Royal Bank confirms Warburg custody buy.
newsitem.headline: Royal Bank confirms Warburg custody buy.

text.p: The Royal Bank of Scotland said on Friday it had signed agreements for the purchase of the custody and investor services division of S.G. Warburg & Co, part of Swiss Bank Corp and certain assets used in the business owned by Mercury Asset Management.
"Agreements have now been signed and it is anticipated that the transaction will be completed during the first quarter of 1997," Royal Bank said in a statement.
The division includes the custody and investor services operations of S.G. Warburg and MAM in the UK, Jersey and Luxembourg, it added.
